get.summary: Returns latest versions of all matching Counterpartiesin json format. This action requires the caller entitled to view Counterparties

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters to be applied. This query parameter can be repeated to apply multiple filters. Format : EntityField,Operator,Value1,...ValueN. Where EntityField is any of the Counterparty field. Operator is the operator symbol and value1..n refers to the operator value(s).  Multiple values can be passed separated by commas if Operator require/accepts multiple values. For possible EntityFields, refer to the schema section for Counterparty

Filter by WithholdingTaxExemptionReason,.description: Filter by WithholdingTaxExemptionReason, not in operator

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Counterparty fields to be returned in the resultant json. If not provided, all fields will be returned.  For possible list of fields, refer to the schema section for Counterparty

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by clause. This query parameter can be repeated to apply sorting on multiple filters. Sorting can be applied on any Counterparty field. For possible fields, refer to the schema section for Counterparty

200.description: Indicates successful  in receiving  all matching Counterparties. The response body would be a json containing resultant set.

ETag.description: ETag of the existing resource in format rootEntityId:revisionId if a specific resource is asked

Location.description: Location of the existing resource if a specific resource is asked

post.summary: Creates a new Counterparty. This action requires the caller entitled to create Counterparties
post.description:
Creates a new  Counterparty.
 The Id property is optional, if not provided it will auto generate an Id.
Fields required for creation are ShortName,Name.
 For possible entity Fields, refer to the schema section for Counterparty. This action requires the caller entitled to create Counterparties

201.description: Indicates successful  deletion of  the specific Counterparty

ETag.description: ETag of the created entity in format rootEntityId:revisionId

Location.description: Location of the created entity

500.description: Internal server error / Request not processable / Four-Eyes request submission failed

parameters.description: Comma separated list of Split fields to be returned in the resultant json. If not provided, all fields will be returned.  For possible list of fields, refer to the schema section for Split

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by clause. This query parameter can be repeated to apply sorting on multiple filters. Sorting can be applied on any Split field. For possible fields, refer to the schema section for Split

200.description: Indicates successful  in receiving  the specific Split belonging to the parent Counterparty. The response body would be a json containing resultant set.

ETag.description: ETag of the existing resource in format rootEntityId:revisionId if a specific resource is asked

Location.description: Location of the existing resource if a specific resource is asked

delete.summary: Deletes an existing Split belonging to Counterparty subject to caller is entitled to delete Splits
delete.description:
Deletes a existing Split.
Split is a sub-entity of Counterparty. This action is subject to caller is entitled to delete Splits

204.description: Indicates successful  update of  the specific Split belonging to the parent Counterparty. The response body would be a json containing updated entity.

412.description: Data deletion was done on an outdated revision

500.description: Internal server error / Request not processable / Four-Eyes request submission failed

patch.summary: Updates an existing Split belonging to Counterparty subject to caller is entitled to edit Splits
patch.description:
Updates a existing Split.
Split is a sub-entity of Counterparty The Id property is optional, if not provided it will auto generate an Id.
Fields required to be passed while editing are Counterparty,Percentage.
 For possible entity Fields, refer to the schema section for Split in json format, subject to caller is entitled to edit Splits

requestBody.description: A json containing field/values to be updated in the specified Split. Any subentity field (if any) would be ignored.

200.description: Indicates successful  update of  the specific Split belonging to the parent Counterparty. The response body would be a json containing updated entity.

ETag.description: ETag of the updated entity in format rootEntityId:revisionId

Location.description: Location of the updated entity

412.description: Data change was done on an outdated revision

500.description: Internal server error / Request not processable / Four-Eyes request submission failed

get.summary: Returns latest version of the Signature of Contact, subject to caller's view entitlements

200.description: Indicates successful  downloading of Signature of Contact. The response body would contain the downloaded Signature

Location.description: Location of the existing binary resource

delete.summary: Deletes an existing Contact belonging to Contact subject to caller is entitled to delete Contacts
delete.description:
Deletes a existing Contact.
Contact is a sub-entity of Contact. This action is subject to caller is entitled to delete Contacts

204.description: Indicates successful  update of Signature of Contact. The response body would contain the updated entity with the Signature containing the generated id of the updated file

412.description: Data change was done on an outdated revision

500.description: Internal server error / Request not processable / Four-Eyes request submission failed

patch.summary: Updates an existing Contact belonging to Contact subject to caller is entitled to edit Contacts
patch.description:
Updates a existing Contact.
Contact is a sub-entity of Contact The Id property is optional, if not provided it will auto generate an Id.
Fields required to be passed while editing is Name.
 For possible entity Fields, refer to the schema section for Contact in json format, subject to caller is entitled to edit Contacts

requestBody.description: A json containing field/values to be updated in the specified Contact. Any subentity field (if any) would be ignored.

200.description: Indicates successful  update of Signature of Contact. The response body would contain the updated entity with the Signature containing the generated id of the updated file

ETag.description: ETag of the resource in format rootEntityId:revisionId

Location.description: Location of the updated resource

412.description: Data change was done on an outdated revision

500.description: Internal server error / Request not processable / Four-Eyes request submission failed

Area.description: Specifies the account owner's resident geographical region or area.

Block.description: Area of land bounded by streets.

BuildingName.description: Name of the building or house.

BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

CountrySubDivision.description: Codified representation of the jurisdiction as published in ISO 3166-2.

Department.description: Identification of a division of a large organization or building.

DistrictName.description: Name of a district, i.e. a part of a town or region.

Floor.description: Floor or store within a building.

Lot.description: Identification of an allotment of land.

PostOfficeBox.description: Numbered box in a post office, assigned to a person or organization, where letters are kept until called for.

Province.description: A territory governed as an administrative or political unit of a country.

RegionIdentification.description: Identification of an administrative division of a country, state, or territory.

SubDepartment.description: Identification of a sub-division of a large organization or building.

AccountType.description: Type of account. Values: 0 = Unknown, 1 = Broker, 2 = Retail, 3 = Strip/Recon, 4 = Breakdown, 5 = Intradesk, 6 = In-House, 7 = Entity, 8=ExecBroker, 9 = ClearingHouse.

Area.description: Specifies the account owner's resident geographical region or area.

Block.description: Area of land bounded by streets.

BuildingName.description: Name of the building or house.

BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

CountrySubDivision.description: Codified representation of the jurisdiction as published in ISO 3166-2.

Department.description: Identification of a division of a large organization or building.

DistrictName.description: Name of a district, i.e. a part of a town or region.

Floor.description: Floor or store within a building.

Lot.description: Identification of an allotment of land.

PostOfficeBox.description: Numbered box in a post office, assigned to a person or organization, where letters are kept until called for.

Province.description: A territory governed as an administrative or political unit of a country.

RegionIdentification.description: Identification of an administrative division of a country, state, or territory.

SubDepartment.description: Identification of a sub-division of a large organization or building.

ABANumber.description: ABA routing number for the account

AccountName.description: The account name for this account

Name.description: Display name of the Bank account

BulkConfirmationExpected.description: When true, this counterparty expects to receive bulk confirmations.

CLSParticipantType.description: Kind of member the counterparty engages in CLS session.

ClearingAgent.description: When true, this counterparty is also a clearing agent.

ClearingFCM.description: When true, this counterparty is also a clearing member firm of one or more exchanges.

ClearingMatcher.description: The third party provider that performs matching for clearing eligible trades against the counterparty.

Code.description: Code or abbreviation of the counterparty

CodeMappingJsonFmt.description: List of all available code type values. DEPRECATED: Use native CT_ fields instead.

ConfirmationNeeded.description: When true, confirmations should be produced and a confirmation profile should be selected on trades with this counterparty.

ConfirmationPlatform.description: Confirmation platform used by the counterparty

ContactTypeId.description: Classification of the contact according to the configurable contact types

Email.description: Main email address of the contact

Fax.description: Main fax number of the contact

Mobile.description: Mobile phone number of the contact.

NamePrefix.description: Prefix to apply to the contact name.

Other.description: Free use text fields for comments, remarks etc

Phone.description: Main phone number of the contact

Signature.description: The image of the signature of the person identified by this contact

CounterpartyConfirmationForCLSRequired.description: When true, this counterparty requires a confirmation for CLS trades.

DateLastReviewed.description: Date the counterparty data has been reviewed the last time by an authorized user.

DealerBIC.description: The Bank Identifier Code, as a 4-character unique identifier for each bank that executed and reported an OTC trade, as required by MiFID.

DvPSettlement.description: When true, this counterparty settles using Delivery versus Payment.

FundManager.description: True when this counterparty is also a fund manager.

IndirectOnly.description: When true, a counterparty usually trades indirect but capable of trading direct.

LegalEntity.description: Legal entity identifier of the bank managing the counterparty ('Us')

LegalEntityIdentifier.description: Global identifier of the legal entity (LEI)

MultimanagedAccount.description: True when this counterparty is managed by more than one fund manager.

NotDefaultConfirmProfile.description: When true, a confirmation profile should not be assigned for this counterparty unless it is configured directly on the counterparty.

PrioritySettlement.description: When true, this counterparty's settlements should be processed with priority.

ReviewOneOffSSIAttach.description: When true, third party payment counterparty one-off SSIs must be reviewed.

SalesRepresentatives.description: List of sales representatives associated to this counterparty.

ShortName.description: Short name of the counterparty used for display when full name is too long

SkipSettle.description: When true, trades for this counterparty should not settle in the back office.

StatusCMD.description: Status of the counterparty for commodities

Subtype.description: Classification of the counterparty according to the configurable counterparty subtype

SuppressTBAAmendConfirmations.description: When true, this counterparty should not receive TBA confirmation amendments.

TBAConfirmation.description: When true, this counterparty expects to receive TBA confirmations.

TaxCode.description: Classification of the tax number according to the configurable tax types

ThirdPartyPayments.description: When true, counterparty one-off instructions can be extracted from the counterparty MT300 and saved on a trade automatically (provided SSI data is correct).

ThirdPartyProvider.description: When CLS participant type = Third Party, the identifier of the Third Party Provider. Either the Third party provider identifier or the Third party provider BIC will be populated.

ThirdPartyProviderBIC.description: When CLS participant type = Third Party, the BIC of the Third Party Provider. Either the Third party provider identifier or the Third party provider BIC will be populated.

Type.description: Classification of the counterparty according to the configurable counterparty type

TypeCMD.description: Type of the counterparty for commodities

VerifySignature.description: When true, a captured image to manually compare against signed confirm is required.

WithholdingTaxExemptionReason.description: Why this counterparty is exempt from withholding tax.

WithholdingTaxLiable.description: When true, this counterparty is liable for withholding tax.

__RESERVED_ALL_CPTYS_HrcParent.description: To be used by RefData only.
